title: David Letterman | Jokes Seth Can't Tell: Black History Month, Dolphins Enjoy Lesbian Sex
description:
There are some jokes that just sound wrong coming from Seth, like the one about a lesbian opera.

Then, Seth interviews David Letterman, the original host of Late Night on NBC, on the 40th anniversary of the show.
